title: SkewSkew
description: A space for exploring data architecture, agentic AI, lakehouse design, and the real-world challenges of building scalable data solutions.
subDescription: You'll find practical insights, deep-dives, architecture slides, and lessons learned from working with organizations solving complex data challenges. Whether you're building your first data pipeline, your AI agent or architecting enterprise-scale solutions, there's something here for your journey.

newsletter.description: I'll share real-world insights from designing data architectures and working with customers at scale. No fluff, just the practical stuff I wish I'd known earlier.
